name: Stash MCP Server
tagline: Make AI IDEs even smarter with your team’s knowledge
description: Stash MCP Server lets AI agents like Cursor, Claude, and Copilot access your team’s real context (code, docs, issues) so they can resolve tickets without endless prompting. Just say "solve my assigned issue with the ID of …" - that’s it.

name: Mozart AI v0.5
tagline: Cursor for making music
description: The AI music platform to create, improvise, and finish music — built by artists for artists. Start with a loop or a prompt, improvise every layer, and finish your music in minutes. Every generation is context aware. Free during beta.

name: Replit Agent 3
tagline: Our most autonomous agent yet
description: Replit’s Agent 3 is its most autonomous AI yet — it can build apps, test them in a real browser, fix issues automatically, and even create other bots or automations, helping developers build faster with minimal supervision.

name: Claude Memory
tagline: Bringing memory to teams at work
description: Claude Memory is a new feature for team and enterprise users that remembers conversations to maintain context across projects. It creates separate, project-based memories and gives users full control to view, edit, or disable what Claude remembers.

name: viral.app
tagline: tracking & analytics for TikTok, Instagram & Youtube
description: viral.app is the leading tracking & analytics tool for viral short-form marketing on TikTok, Instagram Reels and Youtube Shorts. Track unlimited accounts & videos and get deep insights into your performance and engagement metrics.

name: tweakcn
tagline: Design your perfect shadcn/ui theme with real-time preview
description: Customize theme for shadcn/ui with an interactive editor. Supports Tailwind CSS v4, shadcn/ui, and custom styles. Modify properties, preview changes, and get the code in real time.

name: LockedIn
tagline: F**k job applications
description: LockedIn is a tool where you can paste any job URL and watch our AI research the role like a human would, then generate personalized cover letters and resume tips for you to review and use.

name: Rebrowse
tagline: Turn screen-recording into 100 browser flows in one click.
description: F*ck n8n. Just record. Record, Share and Replicate browser flows - in one click.

name: Genspark AI Browser
tagline: World's First On-Device Free AI
description: Excited to announce Genspark AI Browser — now available on Windows and Mac with world's first AI features that will revolutionize how you work online. From on-device AI models to autonomous web navigation – your browser now works for you.

name: Mayson
tagline: No code backend for everyone
description: Meet Mayson, the low-code, AI-enabled BaaS that builds production-ready backends instantly. Auto-generate scalable APIs, deploy to your own cloud, and export clean Python code. No vendor lock-in, full control. Ready for your MVP and beyond.

name: Vidzflow 2.0
tagline: The complete video platform for Webflow
description: Vidzflow is the video platform built for Webflow sites. Host videos without limits, customize a distraction-free player to match your brand, and add interactive tools like CTAs and forms to convert viewers.

name: Saldor
tagline: Hands-free email and calendar.
description: Saldor is the voice-first executive assistant for getting work done on the go. Instead of staring at screens, you can manage your inbox and calendar entirely by voice. Works on iOS with Gmail and Outlook today, with a free plan to get started.

name: Tallyrus
tagline: Analyze your documents faster, smarter, and more efficiently
description: Going through piles of documents is slow, inconsistent, and draining. Tallyrus lets you upload thousands of files and instantly evaluate them against your criteria, transforming hours of manual work into polished insights with a single click.

name: rolyai
tagline: Group chat with AI roles
description: Create your own ai roles. Chat with different roles in one chat like in a normal group chat. You decide who should respond.

name: Meet Macro Terminal
tagline: Claude Code for data analysis
description: A command line tool that gives you direct natural language access to your databases, csv files, and excel files. You can use it to explore data, write and run queries, and export csv and markdown files to share with others - all directly from your terminal.

name: 1For AI
tagline: One Flow. Every AI
description: A lean AI app with GPT, Claude, Gemini, Mistral, and Grok. Signature Auto AI keeps the right model for each request in one flow, making multi-model talks seamless in a unified context. No subscriptions, pay-per-action.

name: Orren
tagline: AI LinkedIn posts that sound human in under 3 minutes
description: Orren turns your ideas into professional LinkedIn posts instantly. No templates, no writer's block. Just human-sounding content that drives engagement. Generate posts, rephrase sections, post on LinkedIn, get fresh ideas, and manage your content calendar.

name: YouStory
tagline: AI personalized storybooks for kids that teach, and inspire
description: Turn your child's favorite toy, pet or artwork into a storybook hero. AI crafts personalized adventures teaching valuable lessons. Professional illustrations in minutes. Stories that star their real-world friends. Bedtime reimagined. Magic guaranteed.

name: SubtitlesFast
tagline: Video Subtitles - Fast!
description: Generate Captivating Subtitles in Minutes SubtitlesFast automatically adds accurate, readable subtitles to your videos - no software, no editing. Just upload your clip and get polished results in minutes.

name: ClearPlan
tagline: 1st editor focus on enhancing LLM output seamlessly.
description: ClearPlan is the first online editor focused on enhancing LLM output seamlessly. Capture AI responses from ChatGPT, Claude, or DeepSeek, then edit with precision, bulk enhancement in our advanced web editor before returning refined content back to your chat.

tagline: Make AI IDEs even smarter with your team’s knowledge
